sentences.en: All great inventions and discoveries propagate themselves.
sentences.cn: 所有的重大发明和发现都会自行向四方传播.

sentences.en: Animal and vegetable pests propagate with extreme rapidity.
Chinese citizens enjoy the freedom to believe in religion and the freedom not to believe in it and to propagate atheism.
sentences.cn: 中国公民有信仰宗教的自由和不信仰宗教、宣传无神论的自由.

sentences.en: Disease of animal and vegetable pests propagate with extreme rapidity.
Insects propagate themselves by means of eggs.
Missionaries went far afield to propagate their faith.
sentences.cn: 传教士到远方去传播其信仰.

sentences.en: Modern media can propagate rumors much more easily than before.
sentences.cn: 现代媒体使谣言的传播比以前容易得多.
大多数植物都是通过种子繁殖的.

sentences.en: Propagate your plants in fresh soil.
sentences.cn: 让你的植物在新鲜土壤中繁殖。
兔子 繁殖 迅速.

sentences.en: Short wave radio can propagate allover the world, making cross - country communication possible.
sentences.cn: 短波无线电可传遍全地球, 达成无国界的通讯.

sentences.en: The easiest way to propagate a vine is to take hardwood cuttings.
sentences.cn: 栽培葡萄最简便的方法就是硬条扦插。

sentences.en: The group launched a website to propagate its ideas .
sentences.cn: 这个团体建了一个网站来宣扬他们的主张。

sentences.en: The group launched a website to propagate its ideas.
sentences.cn: 这个团体建了一个网站来宣扬他们的主张。

sentences.en: The plant can be propagated from seed.
sentences.cn: 这种植物可由种子繁殖。

sentences.en: The trees propagate themselves by cuttings.
The trees will propagate themselves by the reproduction of their seed.
sentences.cn: 这些树将通过种子的再生而自行繁殖.

sentences.en: We can propagate our learning to the next generation.
sentences.cn: 我们能把掌握的知识传给下一代.

trans.tran_en: to spread an idea, belief etc to many people

trans.tran_cn: 繁殖，扩大，[物] 通过媒介传送
繁衍，增殖，使遗传，扩散，使蔓延

trans.tran_en: to spread an idea, belief etc to many people
